narrative:
No-non compliant items noted this inspection.  
Applicant wants to be licensed as a class A breeder.
Please issue a class A license.
License fee will be sent by the applicant to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, ERO
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27605
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
The inspection and Exit interview were conducted with the Applicant and the Applicant’s Wife.
